name: Knitted Mermaid Doll
description: Difficulty: Medium - Requires ability to change colors, increase, decrease and assemble.
full_text: Difficulty: Medium - Requires ability to change colors, increase, decrease and assemble. Size: Dolls measures 14 inches tall Materials: Worsted Weight yarn – You can mix yarn colors to get the combination you’d like: Beige (for skin of doll) Purple for top) Teal (for body and tail) Red (for hair) Poly-fill stuffing Pair of size 4 (US) knitting needles Yarn needle 9mm doll eyes
